reviews.name: Meikan Sankan
reviews.review: This restraunt is just a world class made up of great foods

reviews.name: Neema Okello
reviews.review: This restraunt has alot of good offers for couples and they offer a wide range of foods.

reviews.name: Erustus Ndegwa
reviews.review: I have never ever in my life came to a top restraunt like this they have goog meals.

reviews.name: Yassin Yussuf
reviews.review: Disappointed with the slow service and mediocre food.

reviews.name: Dudlee Kimani
reviews.review: A hidden gem! Delicious sushi and fresh ingredients. The chef's special rolls are a must-try.

reviews.name: Collins Njuguna
reviews.review: Perfect spot for a date night. The ambiance was romantic, and the seafood was fresh and flavorful.

reviews.name: Mark Ngure
reviews.review: Fantastic breakfast spot. The pancakes were fluffy, and the coffee was strong and delicious.
